Title: Relates to amending the New York City Charter in relation to expanding the investigative scope of the Civilian Complaint Review Board
Summary: Expands the investigative powers of the Civilian Complaint Review Board to include complaints alleging bias-based profiling.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, in relation to expanding the investigative scope of the Civilian Complaint Review Board to include allegations of biased-based profiling
